document_data.mainbody:
aryd was a guar who worked at the Szarr Palace of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Jaryd was an aged lightfoot halfling man with a receding hairline and light hair slicked back. He wore a breastplate.
In the , Jaryd was one of three enthralled sentries who stood guard of the entrance to the massive Szarr Palace – home of vampire lord Cazador Szarr located in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate. On the day of the accession ritual, the palaces chamberlain Antwun Dufay‎ ordered no visitor nor delivery to be allowed an entrance, promising a "reward" from Cazador upon the rituals completion.
